isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - AIR CONDITIONING BASIC THEORY, SYSTEM DIAGNOSIS AND SERVICE (WITH R-12 REFRIGERANT SYSTEM) - SPECIAL SERVICE TOOLS - HEATED CHARGING CYLINDER

svcproc.title: HEATED CHARGING CYLINDER
svcproc.para: OEM-1312 Heated Charging Cylinder for R-12 systems or OEM-1426 for HFC-134A systems is calibrated for accurate recharging of air conditioning systems ( Figure 26). It is designed to adjust for volume fluctuations in refrigerant caused by temperature changes. The heating element provides a consistent positive pressure at the cylinder to overcome pressure equalization between the refrigerant source and the system being charged. This unit allows a system to be charged in minutes without operating the system's compressor. Use of this equipment eliminates wasted refrigerant and permits large economical drum container refrigerant purchases.
